column4: Ok I have two questions: 1. How can I tell what video driver I'm using E.G. Ati,i810,fglrx.  2. How can I force X to use the Vesa drivers?
It's essentially empty, Just thinks like Identifier "Configured video Device"
how did you install ATI drivers?
When i run /etc/init.d/gdm start it comes up but is Very distroted
how did you install ATI drivers?
It's an older card ATI doesn't support it
Fglrx doesn't support my card under Anything
if it dont works, try vesa
That doesn't give me any options to change anything, I've tried
I knew to use sudo it still didn't change a thing
